html:
Purchase Order No.: {{doc.name}} Dated: {{doc.transaction_date}}
Purchase Order
To,
{{doc.contact_display}},
{{doc.shipping_address}}
{{doc.shipping_address_display}}

Subject: Purchase Order for Supply of

Reference No. : ........................


Dear Sir/Ma’am,
With reference to the subject cited above, you are requested to Supply …………………………………………………………… at WSC, Bhubaneswar as per below details:
{% for row in doc.items%} {% endfor %}
SL. NO. Item Description Item Name Qty Unit Unit Rate in INR (Excluding GST) GST Total Amount in INR (Inc. of GST)
{{loop.index}} {{row.item_code}} {{row.item_name}} {{row.qty}} Rs.{{row.rate}} {% if row.gst!=0 %}Rs.{{row.gst}}{% else %}0{% endif %} {% if row.amount!=0 %}Rs.{{row.amount}}{% else %}0{% endif %}
Grand Total {{doc.grand_total}}
Amount in words: {{doc.in_words}}
The supply of items shall be as per Annexure -01: Terms and conditions
Authorized Signatory


…………., WSC





Annexure -1
Terms & Conditions

{%- if doc.terms -%} {{doc.terms}} {%- else-%}

........................................

{% endif %}
Suppliers Acceptance:

This is to certify that I fully read the terms and conditions of this Purchase Order. Having fully read and understood the complete requirements of this Purchase Order, I hereby commit myself and my company to serve its Date requirements and fully comply with its terms and conditions. I also further certify that I am authorized by my company to accept this Purchase Order Approved by: in its behalf.
Date: For M/s ………………………………………………..,


___________________________
Name:
Designation:
Contact No:
Email:
name: Purchase Order
